bibl.bibl: Wright, Chauncey. 1872. Evolution by natural selection. [Review of Origin 6th ed., and of ‘Evolution and its consequences’ and ‘Specific genesis’ by St George Jackson Mivart.] North American Review 115: 1–30.
bibl.idno: Lightly annotated proof copy in DAR PAM R204. Online. July issue. Actually pitched by Wright as a reply to ‘Specific genesis’, which was a reply to his review of Genesis of species. SE.
